name: Fireside (itch)
description:
Fireside was made  as an entry for the  Stay Safe! Jam.    #1ssjentry 

Go on a journey, meet other travelers and make new friends along the fireside.

Known Bugs:

  • You can only use items on the map screen (by draging them on your character)
  • Some UI may not be displayed properly
  • End  screen is not linked to the game yet

This game was made by:

  • Paul Redetzky 
  • Carl-Philipp Hellmuth 
  • Linus Gärtig 
  • Music by Matze    Meeh

Emergo Entertainment
